trillipino_jollibee.mask: High-gloss red fiberglass mascot head with a static, joyful expression.
trillipino_jollibee.apparel: Tailored velvet-lapel silk blazer in Jollibee Red over a crisp white barong-style undershirt.
trillipino_jollibee.jewelry_stack: TV Johnny custom diamond grill, triple-stacked 12mm Cuban links, 14k gold nugget rings, and a micro-pave diamond Philippine map pendant.

jeepney_slab.chassis: Extended Philippine Jeepney frame with Houston 'Slab' modifications.
jeepney_slab.wheels: Extremely long chrome 84s 'elbow' wire rims, spinning with high-polish reflections.
jeepney_slab.visuals: Custom 'Salamat' airbrushing, stainless steel horse hood ornaments, and purple neon underglow.
